func_sig.description: Calculate the sum of the interior angles of a pentagon.
func_sig.name: sum_of_angles_of_pentagon

n.description: The number of sides of the polygon.

func_sig.description: Calculate the distance between two points in a 2D plane using the distance formula.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance_between_points

x1.description: The x-coordinate of the first point.

x2.description: The x-coordinate of the second point.

y1.description: The y-coordinate of the first point.

y2.description: The y-coordinate of the second point.

func_sig.description: Calculate the length of AC in a pentagon using the distance formula.
func_sig.name: calculate_ac_length

func_sig.description: Calculate the measures of angles in a pentagon given certain relationships.
func_sig.name: calculate_angle_of_pentagon

C.description: Angle C in degrees (equal to angle D).

C.description: Angle C in degrees (equal to angle D).
